00011 from pyre.applications.Script import Script
00012 from molDynamics.GeneralSettings import GeneralSettings
00013 from molDynamics.mmtk.Mmtk import Mmtk
00014 from molDynamics.gulp.Gulp import Gulp
00015 
00016 class MdApp(Script):
00017     '''Driver for the md engines in DANSE.'''
00018     class Inventory(Script.Inventory):
00019         import pyre.inventory as inv 
00020         mdEngine = inv.facility('mdEngine', default='gulp')
00021         mdEngine.meta['known_plugins'] = ['gulp','mmtk']
00022         #mdEngine = inv.facility('Molecular Dynamics Engine', default=Gulp())
00023         #mdEngine = inv.facility('Molecular Dynamics Engine', default=Mmtk())
00024         mdEngine.meta['tip'] = 'which md engine to use'
00025         generalSettings = inv.facility('General Settings', default = GeneralSettings())
00026         generalSettings.meta['tip'] = 'working directory, engine executable path, etc.'
00027 
00028     def __init__(self):
00029         Script.__init__(self, 'MdApp')
00030         self.ii=self.inventory
00031         
00032     def main(self, *args, **kwds):
00033         self.ii.mdEngine.execute()
00034 
00035 if __name__=='__main__':
00036     app=MdApp()
00037     app.run()
